name: Same Day Agra Tour
description:
Located on the banks of the Yamuna River, the Taj Mahal entices millions of visitors every year. Agra, the home of the gratifying Taj can be easily reached from Delhi through the newly opened Expressway.

This tour has been designed in a way that it offers the admirers with enough time to have the best view of the Taj Mahal. The tour will also take the visitors to the local markets of Agra, wherein they can delve into the history of the city and its colourful fiestas. The tour also comprises visit to Fatehpur Sikri, the once a capital of the mighty emperor Akbar and finally concludes with a rustic tour to one of the surrounding villages.
